field.name: Rate
field.sql: select concat(DepositPercent,'%') as Percent from ut_leagues where LeagueID='$auth->league;'

field.name: Summa
field.sql: select round(@Deposit; + @Deposit;*(select DepositPercent/DayCount from ut_leagues where LeagueID='$auth->league;')*@Term;/100) as Summa

deposit.sql: select p.* from fn_payments p left outer join fn_operation_types t on t.TypeID=p.TypeID where p.ReceiverID='$auth->user;' and p.TypeID='13' and p.Status=0 order by p.Day asc
deposit.empty_rus: У Вас нет вкладов в банке

field.name: Summa
field.sql: select round(@Credit*((1+BankPercent/100)/@Term;+Coalesce(ELT('$auth->rang;',0.92,0.84,0.75)+0,1)*CreditPercent/DayCount/100)) as Summa from ut_leagues where LeagueID='$auth->league;'

return.select: select sum(money) as Debt from fn_payments where status=0 and senderID='$auth->user;' and typeID=14 group by SenderID
return.error_rus: У вас нет долгов по кредитам
return.success_eng: Loan debt is payed out completely

field.name: Days
field.sql: select count(round((Date-unix_timestamp())/86400)) from fn_payments where status=0 and senderID='$auth->user;' and typeID=14 group by SenderID

loan.sql: select sum(Money) as Money, round(sum(Money)/count(distinct Day)) Date ,count(distinct Day) Days from fn_payments where SenderID='$auth->user;' and TypeID='14' and Status=0 group by SenderID
